dict.acceptation: 交通，运输量；（非法的）交易；通信量；交际；

sent.orig: Real time traffic monitor with traffic LED (need to install traffic led plug-in)
sent.trans: 实时监视网络流量（须安装TrafficLED插件）

sent.orig: In 802.16 traffic have two type, one is real traffic another is non-real traffic.
sent.trans: 在802.16中，通常资料流分为两种，一种是即时性资料流，另一种为非即时性资料流。

sent.orig: A continuing programme of traffic control measures is being implemented to improve traffic flows.
sent.trans: 当局继续实施交通管制措施，以改善交通。

sent.orig: The confusion caused by the traffic order is inefficient because of traffic.
sent.trans: 这些混乱的交通秩序是造成交通效率低下的原因。

sent.orig: In addition to road traffic, railway traffic by city is also very convenient.
sent.trans: 除公路交通外，增城市铁路交通也非常方便。
